name: test_e2e_with_logs[808_HHI_SSRF_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_SSRF_001` |
| **Name** | X-Host SSRF via host header |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | ssrf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `X-Host: 127.0.0.1:8080`
- **Encoded**: `X-Host%3A%20127.0.0.1%3A8080`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:31.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected test_id=HHI_SSRF_001-1772277091427-h9mc2 pattern_id=HHI_SSRF_001 uri=/?q=X-Host%3A%20127.0.0.1%3A8080 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
